org.svvrl.goal.gui

Class Browser.History

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.svvrl.goal.gui.Browser.History
  • Enclosing class:
    Browser

    class Browser.History
extends java.lang.Object
    A history contains a hyperlink event, the horizontal scrollbar's value, and the vertical scrollbar's value.
    Author:
    Ming-Hsien Tsai
